thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Frank Baeyens
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Frank Baeyens

author: Frank Baeyens
title: Frank Baeyens
text: Have ordered a lot from Banggood, and I do mean dozens of orders. Have had 2 issues First was a charger that got stuck in customs and for some reason returned to Banggood. They immediately shipped a new one. Second was a broken USB stick (DOA). After mentioning it to support they refunded me without problems
